detailsData.title: Board-Certified Expert
detailsData.content: Unlike most employment law attorneys, Benjamin Yormak is a board-certified specialist in employment law. This is the highest level of recognition that The Florida Bar gives to attorneys, and only 7% of them achieve it.

detailsData.title: Exclusive Employee Representation
detailsData.content: We only represent employees – we fight employers that violate federal and state laws. We strive to recover what was taken from you and set you up for the future.

detailsData.title: Whistleblower Expertise
detailsData.content: Our experience with whistleblowers gives us unique insight into the concerns and stresses that often accompany filing a fraud action. We work closely with the U.S. Department of Justice, the SEC, or the IRS to build your case.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Legal Support
detailsData.content: We provide top-quality, aggressive, and innovative legal representation tailored to the unique circumstances of each client. Our team is dedicated to advancing the rights of employees and the disabled.

subHeading: Protecting You At Work When Your Employer Won't
valueProp: Yormak Employment & Disability Law is the leading law firm in the areas of labor and employment law. Based in Bonita Springs, Florida, and with a branch office in Naples, we are dedicated to helping people who need it most. Whether you have been fired, discriminated against, harassed or denied overtime or wages, or if you know of your employer’s fraud, we can help – in fact, that is all we do. We have narrowly focused our practice so that our staff can focus on you, the client, by providing the highest-quality, most aggressive and most caring legal representation.
CTA: Get An Employment Law Expert On Your Side.

testimonalData.text: Ben is the best in the business, period. He took the time to answer all of my questions completely and in plain English.
I was facing a Goliath opponent in my former employer when I first called Yormak Employment & Disability. Ben was simply excellent and his depth of knowledge is unmatched.
